articles.description: Mert Gunok is compared with Gordon Banks after making one of the Euros' "greatest saves" to send Turkey into the Euro 2024 quarter-finals.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Mert Gunok compared with Gordon Banks after 'unbelievable' save sends Turkey into quarter-finals

articles.description: The Netherlands put in a performance against Romania that suggests that they, like their colourful fans, have joined the party at Euro 2024 and left pundits predicting they could potentially go all the way to the final.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Time to 'stand up and take notice' of Netherlands

articles.description: Novak Djokovic claims a comfortable victory over Vit Kopriva in his first match since knee surgery to reach the second round at Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Novak Djokovic beats Vit Kopriva in first match since knee surgery

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Austria vs Turkey in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Austria vs Turkey LIVE: Euro 2024 score, line-ups, commentary & updates

articles.description: Bronny James understands some people believe he was only drafted to the Los Angeles Lakers because of his legendary father LeBron, but says he will "get through" the negative talk.
articles.title: Bronny James: LeBron James' son ready to deal with doubters after Los Angeles Lakers move

articles.description: Jack Draper marks his first Wimbledon match as British men's number one with a five-set win under the Centre Court lights.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Jack Draper fills Andy Murray void with thrilling Centre Court win

articles.description: World number five Jessica Pegula races into the second round with a 49-minute win over Ashlyn Krueger before rain halts play.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Jessica Pegula into second round with quickfire win over Ashlyn Krueger

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar regains the leader's yellow jersey in thrilling fashion as he races clear to win stage four of the Tour de France.
articles.title: Tour de France: Tadej Pogacar claims thrilling stage win to regain lead

articles.description: Justin Rose comes through qualifying for The Open at Troon but his ex-Ryder Cup team-mate Sergio Garcia falls short for the second successive year.
articles.title: The Open: Justin Rose qualifies for Troon but Sergio Garcia misses out again

articles.description: Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer, Alex Scott and Ashley Williams discuss Cristiano Ronaldo's courage in "stepping up" to score in Portugal's penalty shootout against Slovenia, after missing from the spot earlier in the game and breaking down in tears.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Portugal striker 'deserves' credit for stepping up in Slovenia shootout win
